## RecommendedConfig type

The format of the configuration object passed to the [recommended()](./recommended.recommended.md) function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type RecommendedConfig = {
  colorSchemes?: ("dark" | "light")[];

  breakpoints?: string[];

  pseudoClasses?: `:${string}`[];
};
```
